cont.entity_b: Construction is poor with frequent breakages.

cont.entity_a: Older version had better build quality compared to the new set. Newer version has smaller band and delicate plastic.

Sound quality is fading in older models. Sound shorts in and out when connected to PC. Sound quality is excellent for the price. Clarity and sound quality are high for the price. Sound is clear and well-balanced.
cont.entity_b: Better sound including simulated surround. Sound quality is fine. Volume and surround sound are not as expected.

cont.entity_a: Bass is not as deep as Beats, but high and mid-range are clearer.
Wiring issues leading to mono sound.
Cable is excessively long, causing inconvenience. Cord is very long, beneficial for stationary use but cumbersome for mobility.
Not noise-canceling but effectively drowns out ambient noise.
Comfortable over-the-ear design. Comfortable for long-term use.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable with good range within a home.
Hard to adjust in some models.

cont.entity_a: Requires careful handling due to thin cord.

cont.entity_b: Improved wireless performance and battery life with an extra battery.
Good reception and lightweight. Reception cuts out when the phone rings.
